title: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles
description: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles, known for its vibrant and diverse color palette, encompasses shades like red (#FF1430), blue (#01557A), and yellow (#FFB80F). These colors are reflective of the brand's dynamic approach in the automotive industry, sourced from branding guidelines available at https://brandingstyleguides.com/guide/fiat-2019/.
